item.title: Extract info from flickr using Flickr::API in Perl
Google maps for Thailand now speaks English!
item.description: Google maps for Thailand is now available with English Language Labels - Better late than never. The moment I heard about this I couldn't help myself, still jumping with Joy. Google has finally answered my prayers... Gives me great plans for my travel portal. I can now increase the usability for my visitors as well as increase traffic to the site... Now off to learning javascript and the Google Maps API. After that have to look for sources for GPS data... In case anyone knows of a good Quick n Dirty tutorial, please drop the link in the comments.
